alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 2:26PM MST until January 02 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow...moderate at times. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy to snowpacked road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow continues beyond this evening, however snowfall rates will remain light through Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
